sn22.46:4.5: yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn22.46:4.12: yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
sn22.46:5.1: Evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato pubbantānudiṭṭhiyo na honti.
sn22.46:5.3: Aparantānudiṭṭhīnaṃ asati, thāmaso parāmāso na hoti.
sn22.46:5.4: Thāmase parāmāse asati rūpasmiṃ …
sn22.46:5.8: viññāṇasmiṃ cittaṃ virajjati vimuccati anupādāya āsavehi.
sn22.46:5.13: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
